name: Clever Curler 1 ¬º‚Äù Curling Iron with Ion Technology
about: What it is:A professional curling iron uses infrared and ion technology to protect, increase shine, and tame frizz while creating beautiful curls..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Infrared and ion technology.What Else You Need to Know:The four heat settings make it perfect for any hair type and texture.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply Heat Protect Spray to hair (sold separately). .-Turn on iron and select desired heat setting. .-Curl small sections of hair at a time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this curling iron in early November and use it every single day, and I continue to be SO impressed with the results! I have fine hair that damages easily, but this iron works perfectly every time.  Hair slides easily in the barrel and the curl width is consistent, even if the wrap is layered.  I will be sticking with this brand!

reviews.review_title: A curler that feels good on your hair!!

reviews.review_text: I got this curler to try and use before the holidays, and i am obsessed. It doesn‚Äôt feel like it‚Äôs damaging or ripping out my hair like others i‚Äôve tried before. However i have fine hair so curls don‚Äôt ever last long, but i also need more practice!

If you‚Äôre looking for a curling iron that offers professional results without the ultra high price tag, this curling iron is a great option. While it‚Äôs a bit of an investment, it‚Äôs actually more affordable than many high end styling tools, and the results speak for themselves. Personally I love using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you‚Äôre ready to transform your hair with the BondiBoost Clever Curler than this amazing tool is for you! It uses ion technology that helps seal the hair cuticle, minimizing frizz and increasing shine. The 32mm curling barrel creates gorgeous waves and curls in minutes. Plus, the Clever Curler steams your hair from the inside out, allowing for curls to form at lower temperatures and preventing unnecessary damage. Whether you have fine, thick, curly, or straight hair, you can choose from 4 heat settings to suit your needs. No need to worry about tangled cords - the Clever Curler has a 360-degree swivel cord that lets you move freely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BondiBoost Clever Curler 1 ¬º‚Äù Curling Iron has completely transformed my hair styling routine! As someone with mid-length hair that struggles to hold a curl, I was skeptical, but this curling iron exceeded my expectations.  The design is sleek, and the rose gold barrel adds a touch of elegance. The adjustable temperature setting allowed me to find the perfect heat level for my delicate hair, resulting in beautiful curls without damage. The 1 ¬º‚Äù barrel size creates versatile curls, from tight bouncy curls to loose beachy waves, and the ceramic coating keeps my curls smooth and frizz-free.  What impressed me most were the smart safety features, like the automatic shut-off function, which gives me peace of mind. The curling iron is durable, and I'm confident it will last.  In conclusion, the BondiBoost Clever Curler is a must-have for mid-length hair. Its advanced technology, user-friendly design, and outstanding results make it stand out. I highly recommend this curling iron for anyone looking to achieve effortless and long-lasting curls!

The deluxe barrel and 360¬∞ swivel cord allows for styling ease to create effortless beachy waves.  Opinion: Love this curler! So easy, simple to use.
